metadata.title: CVE-2021-45846 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw in the AMF parser of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 allows an attacker to cause an application crash using a crafted AMF document, where a metadata tag lacks a "type" attribute.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
